title: Dead Island
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish.  A holiday paradise gone mad after a zombie outbreak. The player’s only chance to survive is to escape from the island. Dead Island combines first-person action with a heavy focus on melee combat, character development and customization of a vast array of weapons. All of these  features are presented in a dark zombie story with a campaign that can be played with up to 4 players in co-op mode.

contentRating.label: M (Mature)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Basecap
childDownloads.description: Is the harsh sunlight making it hard to spot zombies? This baseball cap will help give you some shade.

childDownloads.title: Bloodbath Arena Multiplayer Mode + Leaderboards
childDownloads.description: New challenges in four different arenas await players in this single and multiplayer gameplay DLC! They have to ward off waves and waves of deadly zombie attacks, one more gruesome than the next! In the Bloodbath DLC characters can loot experience points and items and bring them over to the campaign. To show off their skills in zombie fighting they can use the newly implemented Leaderboards. A new exclusive weapon, the Sonic Pulse Grenade, tops this DLC package off.

childDownloads.title: Ryder White
childDownloads.description: Players have survived the terrors that took place on Banoi, but did they really get all the pieces of the puzzle? Dead Island´s Ryder White DLC lets you re-experience the Zombie outbreak, but this time through the eyes of the villain. Play through Ryder White´s story and understand the motivation behind the acts of this military man.
